example.eg: Cover your body so you don't feel the cold air.
example.egtrans: 盖住身体，这样你就不会感觉到冷了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 盖住, 遮住, 保护

example.eg: When we painted the ceiling we covered the furniture with old sheets.
example.egtrans: 当粉刷天花板时，我们用旧床单盖住家具。

example.eg: The tablecloth covered the entire table.
example.egtrans: 桌布盖住了整张桌子。

example.eg: Does the cost of this ticket cover government fees, too?
example.egtrans: 这张票的票价里是否也包括了政府收费？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包括, 包含, 涵盖

example.eg: Does twenty dollars cover all the expenses?
example.egtrans: 二十美元是否足够支付所有费用？

example.eg: Can you cover for me at work on Saturday night?  I want to stay in.
example.egtrans: 你周六晚上能帮我代班吗？我想待在家里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 代替…工作，给…替班，帮…代班

example.eg: Critics covered the writer with praise after the publication of his first novel.
example.egtrans: 这位作家的首部小说出版之后，评论家们对他大加赞赏。

example.eg: They put a cover over the piano to protect it.
example.egtrans: 他们给钢琴套上套子以保护它。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 覆盖物, 盖子, 盖子

example.eg: The book's cover protects the binding from dust.
example.egtrans: 书的封面保护装订好的书籍不受尘埃侵扰。

example.eg: The CIA agent travelled under cover.
example.egtrans: 中情局探员伪装出行。

example.eg: He took cover in the forest.
example.egtrans: 他藏身在森林中。

example.eg: The question was really just a cover for his desire to talk with her.
The soldier fell to his stomach, hoping to find cover from the bullets.
example.egtrans: 士兵扑倒在地，希望能躲过子弹。

example.eg: These short plants provide good ground cover.
Do you have enough cover to pay for the meal?
example.egtrans: 你有足够的钱来付这顿饭吗？

example.eg: This plan provides you with cover in case of hurricanes.
example.egtrans: 如果遭遇飓风，该计划能为你提供保险。

example.eg: This is a cover of a Bob Dylan song.
example.egtrans: 这是鲍勃·迪伦一首歌的翻唱版。

example.eg: There is a cover of ten dollars to enter the club.
It's pouring down. We need to find somewhere under cover until it stops.
example.egtrans: 大雨倾盆。我们得找个有遮挡物的地方等到雨停。

example.eg: He got under the covers and went to sleep.
If you cover temporarily, I'll get the other equipment.
example.egtrans: 如果你能暂时顶替一下，我就去把另一个设备取来。

example.eg: The oil soon covered the entire lake.
Can you cover these tasks for me?
This insurance policy covers car accidents.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…提供保险, 覆盖, 承保

example.eg: We covered all of South America on the last trip.
She covered the White House for the newspaper for two years.
Cover me while I run to the next bunker.
The band covered an old Dylan classic in their concert.
He did an excellent job covering their star player and they won the game.
Do you have enough money to cover the bet?
Please cover up the leftover food so we can eat it later.  She tried to cover up her bruise with make-up.
example.egtrans: 请盖好剩菜剩饭以便我们之后食用。

example.eg: Although Sheila refused to help Gary commit the robbery, she did help him cover up afterwards.
example.egtrans: 虽然席拉拒绝协助盖里实施抢劫，不过之后她确实帮他掩盖了犯罪事实。

example.eg: The candidate tried to cover up his affair with a woman.
example.egtrans: 竞选者试图掩盖他和一位女性的婚外情。

example.eg: Her co-workers tried to cover up for her many mistakes.
example.egtrans: 她的同事试图包庇她的多次过失。

example.eg: Visitors must cover up if they want to enter the church.
example.egtrans: 如果想要进入那座教堂，访客们就需要穿能完全遮盖身体的衣服。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 穿能完全遮盖身体的衣服

example.eg: The back cover had a brief description of the story.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 揭露...的身份, 揭穿...的底细

example.eg: There are few bookbinders who can repair the gilt lettering on leather book covers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 书皮, 封皮, 封面

example.eg: The cloud cover was so thick that drivers turned their headlights on.

dsense.name: cover all bases, cover your bases, cover all the bases

example.eg: We have researched it thoroughly and we believe that we have covered all the bases.
In European restaurants you often find a cover charge for bread and butter.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 覆盖作物, 覆土作物

example.eg: To apply for the position, please send your resume and a cover letter.
example.egtrans: 如申请本职位，请发送您的简历和求职信。

example.eg: Julie posted the documentation with a covering letter.
example.egtrans: 朱莉将文件同附函一道寄了出去。

example.eg: Joanne forgot to write her name on the cover page of her history paper.
The faxed document was five pages plus a cover sheet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 掩盖...踪迹, 掩盖...证据
翻唱版本, 转录制品

dsense.name: cover your ass
dsense.guideword: US, figurative, vulgar, slang (take measures not to be blamed)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 掩盖你犯的错, 帮你收拾烂摊子

example.eg: Taylor criticized the government report for being a cover-up.
Women must wear a cover-up over their swimsuits.

dsense.name: don't judge a book by the cover, don't judge a book by its cover

example.eg: She definitely looks trustworthy, but don't judge a book by its cover.
What an odd family they were! - they kept dust covers on all their furniture.
example.egtrans: 他们可真是奇怪的一家人！所有家具上都放着防尘罩。

dsense.name: first-day cover, first day cover
dsense.guideword: (postage stamp franked on day of issue) (邮政)

example.eg: There is a direct relation between disappearance of forest cover and extinction of species of animals.
I read it from cover to cover in one sitting.

dsense.name: inside front cover
dsense.guideword: (reverse side of book or magazine cover)

example.eg: The price of the book is marked on the inside front cover.
He couldn't take the photo properly because the lens cover was still on.

dsense.name: operculum, gill cover, plural: opercula, operculums

example.eg: We need to re-cover the sofa, as the stains won't come out.
The snow cover's melting fast: there's only a couple of inches left.
As the dogs were always dirtying the sofa, I bought two sets of removable sofa covers.
It was raining so hard we had to take cover in a shop doorway.

dsense.name: under cover of [sth], under the cover of [sth]

example.eg: Under cover of legitimate businesses, the Mob continued its illegal activities.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的掩护下, 打着…的幌子

example.eg: An undercover agent agreed to sell him narcotics.
The undercover operation was aimed at infiltrating terrorists.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 秘密的, 私下进行的

example.eg: Police went undercover to learn how the bribery scheme worked.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 秘密地, 在私下进行地
